html:
Nov 8 (Reuters) - AMAZON WEB SERVICES, INC: : *AWS ANNOUNCES PLANS TO OPEN SECOND REGION IN CANADA *AMAZON WEB SERVICES, INC - NEW AWS CANADA WEST (CALGARY) REGION WILL BE AVAILABLE IN LATE 2023/EARLY 2024 *AMAZON WEB SERVICES - NEW AWS CANADA WEST (CALGARY) REGION WILL CONSIST OF 3 AVAILABILITY ZONES AT LAUNCH AND JOIN EXISTING AWS CANADA REGION IN MONTREAL *AMAZON WEB SERVICES - OVERALL, AWS ESTIMATED TO INVEST OVER $17 BILLION IN CANADA BY 2037 THROUGH CONSTRUCTION & OPERATION OF TWO INFRASTRUCTURE REGIONS


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 08-NOV-202116:34:00.18 GMT
